sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="text" id="datepicker" class="form-control" />
</template>

<script>
import $ from "jquery"
export default {
    name: "MyDatepicker",
    mounted() {
        $(document).ready(function () {
            $('#datepicker').on('click', () => {
                $('#datepicker').datepicker({
                    format: "dd/mm/yyyy",
                    autoclose: true,
                    toggleActive: true,
                });
            });
            $('#datepicker').change(() => {
                this.$emit("onSelect", $('#datepicker').val());
            });
        });
    },
    methods: {
        getDatepicker() {

        },
    }
}
</script>
